author: craigmcc
msg: Implement mechanisms to allow Interceptors (using the existing Tomcat
technology) to be declared in the "server.xml" file, and initialized at
server startup time.  You can now add an element like this:
to add an interceptor to all contexts that match the specified docBase
pattern.  The interceptor class must implement either ServiceInterceptor
Among other motivations, these additions enable the use of the Tyrex
Transaction Manager provided by the ExoLab group <http://tyrex.exolab.org>
with Tomcat, to provide transaction processing, resource declaration, and
connection pooling capabilities consistent with J2EE requirements.
